Non-Alcoholic IPA

A 6-pack of our signature non-alcoholic IPA, dry-hopped for easy sipping day through night. A variety of barley, wheat, and oat malts provide a well-rounded backbone upon which the hops can shine. Enjoy this healthy convergence of an East-coast and West-coast style IPA.

Pick YOUR good time
  • Sunny day on the stoop
  • Before you meet her dads
  • Past midnight at the bar
  • Because you feel like it

Tasting notes: Lemon scone, fresh spruce, pink grapefruit, tropical ice-pop, honeydew melon, and ripe pear.

SHOP NOW

IPA
CHECKLIST
  • Vividly hoppy
  • Plush & refreshing body
  • Thoughtful bitterness
  • Modest haze
